about_the_game: A delicious fusion of first-person tower defence and baking sim. Bake delectable treats to launch at waves of unruly, failed desserts attacking your candy kingdom. As sweet chaos unfolds, you must strategize your craft and arm yourself with the perfect creations to defend your castle!

name: Sugar Siege Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 950 or AMD Radeon R9 380
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: A candy-themed defensive shooter where you bake a variety of delicious ammo to launch at waves of edible enemies.
